rooms.description: Spacious living area with Bohemian decor elements and large floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light. Ideal for social gatherings, furnished with a cozy sofa set, bohemian rugs, and indoor plants.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room with a Bohemian-style dining table, ambient lighting and an open feel.
Modern kitchen with Vastu-friendly layout ensuring optimal placement relative to the entrance. Features an island counter and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Primary bedroom with a private balcony to enjoy natural light and a serene view. The layout follows Vastu principles with the bed placed in a commanding position.
Compact but functional bathroom designed with privacy in mind, positioned according to Vastu for optimal energy flow.
Open balcony area adjoining the bedroom to allow natural light and fresh air, featuring seating and decorative elements for relaxation.

openings.description: Main entrance with a welcoming facade, designed to align with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow into the home.
Secondary exit or service entrance placed on the south side as per Vastu to allow easy movement and maintain energy balance.
